messages.subject: Vote for Unschooling in this poll!!!
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry for the cross-posting.  :o) By now, most of you have seen the unschooling article on msn. They now have a poll up along with readers opinions of
messages.messageBody:
Sorry for the cross-posting. :o)

By now, most of you have seen the unschooling article on msn. They now have
a poll up along with readers' opinions of unschooling at
http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/15148804/

Please forward to your unschooling friends & groups.

Peace & love ~

Leslie
